thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Banks Cheer Return of Wild Markets

author: Max Colchester
title: Banks Cheer Return of Wild Markets

organizations.name: banks cheer return of wild markets banks

text:
Banks have blamed placid markets for lackluster returns in their big trading operations. This week they’re cheering the big market swings, seeing hope for a boost in fees that dropped off a cliff last year.
“Anything that brings back volatility would be good,” said Peter Tchir, macro-investing strategist at New York-based Academy Securities LLC. “Maybe we could see a return to better quarters” for banks across their fixed-income trading businesses, from currencies to interest-rate hedging.
